name: The Bat Knight's Adventure VR
description:
Instructions:

Welcome Bat Knight

Move with the left stick.

You can punch enemies and glass with your fists. 

The Bat-knife's one use is against ranged enemies and Señor Freeze.

The Bat-knife also has only one use before it breaks so you need to defeat two enemies to get another one (a ding will play). 

To get the full Bat Knight experience, try fighting all enemies you see however, it isn't necessary.

Follow the road to find the sewer's manhole.

Slide through the sewers for at the end the Golden Burger will show you where Señor Freeze is.

Señor Freeze needs to be stopped quickly.

Walk into the red circle to start your adventure.
